name: Mazing
description:
Mazing is a maze game with different maze genres. Choose your maze genre, complete the maze, and unlock the next maze. The maze becomes bigger and harder.

Features

  • 30 Single Levels!
  • 30 Single(Time) Levels!
  • 3 Single(Leaderboard) Levels!
  • 30 Multi Levels!
  • 30 Multi(Time) Levels!
  • 3 Multi(Leaderboard) Levels!
